code: import axios from"axios";import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import TopBar from"../TopBar";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ViewImages(){const[images,setImages]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchImages=async()=>{const response=await axios.get('/api/v1/images/upload',{headers:{'Authorization':`Bearer ${localStorage.getItem('token')}`,'Content-Type':'multipart/form-data'}});setImages(response.data);};fetchImages();},{});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("head",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TopBar,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"background",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[images.map((image,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:`http://localhost:3000/${image}`,alt:`User Image ${index}`},index)),";"]})})]});}export default ViewImages;
